provisions.content:
12. The issue date of a bond shall be the day of the month and fargg,";p

provisions.title: Section 13
provisions.content:
13.-(1) Bonds which have been destroyed, multilated, lost or stolen ;g;aanian
may be replaced with bonds of equal denomination subject to such of bonds.
terms and conditions as the Bank may deem fit to impose and subject

       (2) The Bank may attach to the issue under this regulation of
any bond such conditions as to indemnity or otherwise as it thinks fit.

provisions.title: Section 17
provisions.content:

act done in good faith and without negligence in accordance with these gLA"k"and
Regulations, and the receipt of the person to whom money is paid or
repaid shall be a full dischaxge to the Bank for the amount paid or

covery by any person or his representatives of any money lawfully due
to him from the person to whom that money was paid by or under the
direction of the Bank, or from the representatives of that person, or
affect the right which any person or his representatives may have in
respect of a bond against a third party.
